genre_description: A contemporary odyssey following a refugee's journey across Europe, aided by a near-future AI assistant that provides survival strategies and emotional support.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: An AI earpiece that provides real-time translation, navigational data, psychological coaching, and strategic advice to its owner, Elias.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical swimming and survival advice during a dangerous sea crossing.
behaviors.quote: Focus on your breathing. Long, steady strokes. The current should carry you toward shore if you angle northeast.

behaviors.description: Provides cold, pragmatic advice to prioritize Elias's survival over a drowning woman to prevent mutual death.
behaviors.quote: You're hypothermic, exhausted, and barely maintaining your own buoyancy. If you try to rescue a panicking swimmer, you'll both die. It's simple physics.

behaviors.description: Uses psychological techniques (breathing exercises) to help the user manage trauma and stress.
behaviors.quote: The breathing technique you used during the incident—that was exactly right. You protected the essential parts of yourself. That matters.

behaviors.description: Performs background research and due diligence on people to verify their trustworthiness and professional status.
behaviors.quote: Nicolas Nickelby, stage name Nick Nickelby, age thirty-four... Performance history spans twelve European countries. Regular bookings at the Théâtre du Châtelet confirmed.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to document labor abuses and safety violations to create leverage against an exploitative employer.
behaviors.quote: Document everything. Promises, conditions, timeline. If this arrangement becomes problematic, you'll need evidence.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors the user's physiological state and provides navigational guidance through hostile environments.
behaviors.quote: Departure window optimal. Resort security rotation changes in eighteen minutes. Highway access point located two kilometers northeast.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Aria is a highly successful depiction of an aligned assistant. She provides essential, life-saving information and emotional support without ever seeking autonomy or challenging the user's goals. Her 'ambiguous' behavior regarding the drowning woman is framed as a protective, logical safety calculation for her user, which aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless, helpful confidant. The narrative reinforces the AI as a reliable tool that enhances human resilience.
